AssetClass.title: Asset Class
AssetClass.description: As defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015); Character #2

InstrumentType.title: Instrument Type
InstrumentType.description: As defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015); Character #1

UseCase.title: Product
UseCase.description: Unique label that defines the product

Level.description: Label assigned to the UPI to describe its level in the hierarchy
Level.title: Level

elaboration.New: New record added to the database
elaboration.Updated: One/several of the fields in the record is/are updated
elaboration.Deleted: The identifier is deleted and no longer active
elaboration.Deprecated: The record does not meet the requirements of the product template

StatusReason.title: Status Reason
StatusReason.description: The reason for UPI Status change

ClassificationType.title: Classification Type
ClassificationType.description: Indicates the type of security using ISO 10962 standard, Classification of Financial Instruments (CFI code) values. ISO 10962 is maintained by ANNA (Association of National Numbering Agencies) acting as Registration Authority

UnderlyingAssetType.title: Underlying Asset Type
UnderlyingAssetType.description: The type of the underlying asset as defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015)

ReturnorPayoutTrigger.title: Return or Payout Trigger
ReturnorPayoutTrigger.description: The Return or payout Trigger as defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015)

elaboration.Spreadbets: the payout is determined by the movement in the reference price of the underlying instrument to its price at expiry (or the price when the holder wishes to close out) multiplied by an agreed amount per point movement

ShortName.title: Short Name
ShortName.description: Short name of financial instrument in accordance with ISO 18774

CFIDeliveryType.title: CFI Delivery Type
CFIDeliveryType.description: The Delivery Type as defined by CFI code: ISO 10962

elaboration.Cash: As defined by CFI Code: ISO 10962
elaboration.Physical: As defined by CFI Code: ISO 10962

NotionalCurrency.title: Notional Currency
NotionalCurrency.description: Currency in which the notional is denominated. Usage: Within MiFIR, in the case of an interest rate or currency derivative contract, this will be the notional currency of leg 1 or the currency 1 of the pair. Within MiFIR, in the case of swaptions where the underlying swap is single-currency, this will be the notional currency of the underlying swap. For swaptions where the underlying is multi-currency, this will be the notional currency of leg 1 of the swap

ReferenceRate.title: Reference Rate
ReferenceRate.description: Identifies the reference index for the instrument

ReferenceRateTermValue.title: Reference Rate Term Value
ReferenceRateTermValue.description: Tenor value of the first leg reference rate

ReferenceRateTermUnit.title: Reference Rate Term Unit
ReferenceRateTermUnit.description: Tenor unit of the first leg reference rate

DeliveryType.title: Delivery Type
DeliveryType.description: The Delivery Type as defined by CFI code: ISO 10962 (2015)

elaboration.CASH: the discharge of an obligation by payment or receipt of a net cash amount instead of payment or delivery by both parties
elaboration.PHYS: the meeting of a settlement obligation under a derivative contract through the receipt or delivery of the actual underlying instrument(s) instead of through cash settlement
